AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ParachuteLaunchShield" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toParachutingShield") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ParachuteLaunch" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toParachuting") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ShieldBored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldIdleToSelected") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ShieldBored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldIdleToSelected") elseif Prev == "STATE_SelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToShieldSelected") elseif Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachuting") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ShieldSuppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldfromSuppressed") elseif Prev == "STATE_ShieldSelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldSelectedToIdle") elseif Prev == "STATE_Shieldstunned_flailing" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("STATE_Shieldstunned_landing") elseif Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachutingShield") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_Suppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromSuppressed") elseif Prev == "STATE_SelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToIdle") elseif Prev == "STATE_stunned_flailing" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("STATE_stunned_landing") end if Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachuting") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_Suppressed" and Prev ~= "TRANS_toSuppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toSuppressed") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_OverWater" and Prev ~= "TRANS_ToWater" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ToWater") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_OverWater" or Prev == "TRANS_ToWater" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_FromWater") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_bored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IdleToSelected") elseif Prev == "STATE_ShieldSelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldSelectedToSelected") end Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachuting") end
